siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Anticipate likely scenarios
frontmatter.description: If the situation gets out of control, it's often because of earlier mistakes. Play through possible scenarios mentally ahead of time, anticipate the most likely scenarios, and then repeat the process better the next time.

frontmatter.title: Create projects too good to ignore
frontmatter.description: Make better things. Do better work. Demonstrate the possibilities.

frontmatter.title: Digital solutions get better over time
frontmatter.description: Put effort into solutions that get better over time, and don't depend on manual maintenance.

frontmatter.title: Veering off track
frontmatter.description: Taking the wrong perspective makes it almost impossible to see the change in real time. With the proper view, it's easy to prevent veering off track.

frontmatter.title: Endless opportunities in digital development
frontmatter.description: Digital development isn't entirely unrelated from real estate development. Build something from nothing, improve existing sites, and make everything work.

frontmatter.title: What comes in next stage of pandemic
frontmatter.description: summer quickly fades. school begins with questions amiss. as to what comes next

frontmatter.title: Digital products transcend time constraints
frontmatter.description: Time is less in personal control. Work to trade less time for money. Develop repeatable digital products to escape time constraints.

frontmatter.title: Create own opportunities
frontmatter.description: Create own opportunities. Give others a reason. Don't wait for a call. Make it happen.

frontmatter.title: Develop options without initial commitments
frontmatter.description: Don't rush to commit, especially when unknowns are present. Be prepared by developing best next steps.

frontmatter.title: Plan for contingencies
frontmatter.description: There will be interruptions ahead. Plan for likely scenarios and recognize it won't go as planned.
